description:
The story follows masked wrestler Genzou Shibata, who likes all kinds of animals and creatures. One day he is summoned to another world, where a princess asks him to help kill magical beasts, but he gets mad and puts her in a German suplex. Instead, he begins life as a pet shop owner in the other world.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: เคโมโนมิจิ ร้านสัตว์เลี้ยงในโลกแฟนตาซี

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Wrestling
tags.description: Centers around the sport of wrestling.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

node.description:
__Gender:__ Female
__Circle:__ 斬鉄剣 (Zantetsuken)

[Website](http://www.mo-suke.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mmousuke) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=52400) | [Tumblr](https://mattakumo-suke.tumblr.com/)

Mangaka and illustrator. She works as light novel and anime illustrator and contributed in anthologies. Her penname was used by her brother in schooldays.
**Miura Kazuya** is a Japanese director, episode director, animator, animation supervisor, animation director and storyboard artist.

__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)
With the band Make-Up, he recorded several songs for the anime Saint Seiya, including the first opening song Pegasus Fantasy and the first ending song Blue Forever.
